articles.description: Follow live text updates from day one of the third Test between India and England in Rajkot.
articles.title: India v England: Third Test, day one - text updates

articles.description: Ciro Immobile's penalty gives Lazio a shock win over Bayern Munich in their Champions League last-16 first leg and increases the pressure on manager Thomas Tuchel
articles.title: Kane toils as below-par Bayern stunned by Lazio

articles.description: Two armed people are in custody following the shooting in Kansas City, Missouri, near the victory parade.
articles.title: Kansas City shooting: One dead and nine injured near Super Bowl parade

articles.description: Travis Kelce says his outburst at Kansas City Chiefs head coach Andy Reid in Sunday's Super Bowl was "definitely unacceptable"
articles.title: Travis Kelce: Tight end says outburst at Kansas City head coach Andy Reid was 'unacceptable'

articles.description: Red Bull team boss Christian Horner will make his first public appearance on Thursday since the emergence of charges of inappropriate behaviour.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Red Bull team boss to attend F1 car launch amid investigation

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says it would be "the greatest moment" if he could help Mercedes return to the top in his final season with the team.
articles.title: Mercedes: Lewis Hamilton says ending final season at the top would be 'the greatest moment'

articles.description: Centre Fraser Dingwall says England need time to build "connections" as they look to sharpen their attack against Scotland in the Six Nations.
articles.title: England need time to build 'connections' - Dingwall

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe returns from injury with a goal that helps Paris St-Germain take control of their Champions League last-16 tie against Real Sociedad.
articles.title: Mbappe scores as PSG beat Real Sociedad in first leg

articles.description: Spain's Rafael Nadal's return to competitive tennis is pushed back after he pulls out of the Qatar Open.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: Former world number one pulls out of Qatar Open

articles.description: India’s Ravindra Jadeja jokes that if Ravichandran Ashwin gets his 500th Test wicket against England in Rajkot it may be "destiny".
articles.title: Jadeja jokes about Ashwin’s 500th-wicket ‘destiny’
